body.name: LEGO City Electric Sports Car 60383, Toy for 5 Plus Years Old Boys and Girls, Race Car for Kids Set with Racing Driver Minifigure, Building Toys
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Kids can take race play to the next level with this LEGO City Electric Sports Car toy with a toy charging point and a racing driver minifigure
The buildable toy LEGO race car features intricate details, such as rear spoiler, cool wheels and an eye-catching neon-yellow design
Young fans can seat the LEGO racing driver minifigure in the tinted cockpit, adjust the toy's solar panels and connect its cable to the car
No batteries needed; this toy Electric Sports Car is powered by kids’ imaginations - with the help of printed and digital building guides
This LEGO City toy race car playset makes a cool treat or birthday gift for 5 plus year olds, and kids who love LEGO vehicles and building toys
body.description: Kids who like toy cars will love the LEGO City Electric Sports Car (60383) building toy for kids Ages 5 plus years old, in a futuristic design with loads of cool detailing. Kids get behind the wheel of the lightning-fast electric LEGO race car. Once they check out the eye-catching neon-yellow detailing, cool wheels and huge rear spoiler, they can pop in the included LEGO racing driver minifigure and visit the solar-powered charging point before heading for the nearest racetrack! The LEGO City Electric Sports Car toy for kids comes with an easy-to-follow pictorial printed building guide and the LEGO Builder app – a digital building companion with intuitive zoom and rotate tools that enable kids to visualize the finished model car from all angles as they build. Kids grow up surrounded by amazing vehicles and machines, and with LEGO City Great Vehicles building toys they get to explore them up close, with realistic models and fun characters that inspire open-ended imaginative play. Why not surprise a car-loving child with this LEGO City playset - a great birthday gift idea for 5 plus year olds who love toy cars and LEGO vehicles. Electric Sports Car toy measures over 1.5 in. (4 cm) high, 4.5 in. (12 cm) long and 2 in. (5 cm) wide. Contains 95 Pieces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Futuristic toy sports car Power up kids’ play with this eye-catching LEGO City Electric Sports Car playset, including a driver minifigure.
A build-and-play set for car fans aged 5+ Kids can enjoy a fun build before heading to the highway for high-speed adventures.

LEGO City Electric Sports Car Cool design Neon-yellow detailing, cool wheels and a huge rear spoiler. Pretend charging station Features adjustable solar panels and a connectable cable. A treat for fans of cool cars Makes a great birthday, holiday or any-day surprise.
Enter a digital world of building Builders can zoom in, rotate and track their progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app.
More playsets to collect and combine Kids can combine this set with others from the LEGO City range (each set sold separately) for more high-speed action!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: Legos are always a hit. This was fun and easy for my 10 year old grandson. It has lots of detail

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, attractive, effective.
reviews.reviewText: So, we'll lead with the disclaimer ; I know that a lot of people do NOT like the super vibrant highlighter-yellow that LEGO has been using in recent sets. I'm not on that list, as long as it's used *well*. There's moments where it makes all the sense in the world - emergency vehicles for use as a visibility aid, safety vests, high-spec 'tuner' vehicles that are SUPPOSED to stand out ... and even then, not usually as a primary color. This particular use fits into that last category.So the set is an obviously non-real-world inspired electric sports car. The set is designed for 5+, has no stickers, and has what I feel is a perfectly good, sleek look to it. The implication of electric batteries in the back as the main power source is .. a little cheesy, but perfectly reasonable for the age range intended, and is easily modified if desired. The set's build is fast, simple, and on the whole pretty enjoyable.The only flaw is that the set provides no good charging points on the car itself - the only studs that are accessible for that use are by the front of the windshield, and both of them are 'glass'. I understand that there's a bit of a careful parts budget here, but LEGO really should have worked in a single stud on the side somewhere to serve as a charging port. Still, that's a fairly minor flaw, and not one that will detract form any kids who want to play with it - and they *are* the target audience, to be certain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson 6 Christmas wish
reviews.reviewText: Grandson 6 was delighted with this. Good product. Great price! Happy child!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good gift for 10-year old grandson
reviews.reviewText: Grandson was excited to get this car. The only issue I had was that it was shipped in a padded envelope, and the box was completely destroyed. Not sure how elephants accessed the mail to trample it. Fortunately, the kit itself appeared to be intact. Repackaged it and enclosed the front of the box, even though it was torn and crumpled. He seemed to be ok with that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice little set
reviews.reviewText: My experienced 6yo Lego builder loved this set! It’s funny that only a Lego person with NO hair fits inside the car, but we didn’t mind 😅It was a very affordable little surprised to keep my son entertained during our long flight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clear instuction and good looking
reviews.reviewText: Its fun for kids to use this simple lego car.Its hours of fun to build this runnable car.It had few parts which memic the car components.Lots of fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toy, bad handling
reviews.reviewText: The toy was a Christmas present for our child. It showed up badly crunched as the photo shows. Doesn't seem right to give the product a bad review despite this. We put together the toy and removed it from the destroyed box. Could've been a much better transaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: Name brand Lego set for a decent price. Instruction book came with it and it was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple and inexpensive gift for boys
reviews.reviewText: I gifted this Lego set for my 5 year old this past Christmas and he truly enjoyed it. It was simple enough for him to do by himself. Bonus it was super inexpensive!
Meu sobrinho adorou o lego. Ele falou " vai para minha coleção"
